title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
4. Save the changes.
5. Close the report parameter settings.

OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

EB: The report parameter should retain the default value of 'aaa' when modified to 'bbb'.

SR: 1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
4. Save the changes.
5. Close the report parameter settings.

Note: Verify that the report parameter retains the default value of 'aaa' after modifying and saving it as 'bbb'.
